fr.title: SDMS : An open-source library for POSGs
fr.abstract: A solver and a library for POSGs.

fr.title: On continuous-state MDPs in extensive-form
fr.authors: J. Arjonilla, D. Albert, J. Dibangoye
fr.abstract: This paper presents a novel—yet more scalable—alternative, namely serial central planning for simultaneous decentralised execution.
